wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Galloway FRS (26 February 1796 – 1 November 1851) was a 19th-century Scottish mathematician.

response: His daughter, Margaret Wallace, married the mathematician Thomas Galloway. His sons included the Rev Alexander Wallace (1803–1842) and Archibald C. Wallace (1806–1830).
